TopicTitle: Burn time way off? -- Kerbal Engineer Redux

Articles.Content:
So in the Spaceplane Hangar, KER reported that I had 9 hours and 30 minutes of fuel in my craft. Atmospheric settings were on.

However, not 20 minutes later, I had run out of fuel.

What gives? Does KER not take into account the new ISPs or something?

That's a lot of fuel. But yes, I've seen weird values from KER. I had one ship that KER reported I had 2000m/s dV (It was to complete a suborbital contract). I launched it and it barely made it to 40km. When I checked the ship later, KER decided it only had 1500m/s dV.

I think we just need to wait for a proper update.

Note that KSP was running for 10 minutes in the background without the engines on. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![4kTD41c.png](http://i.imgur.com/4kTD41c.png)

![y8rno5Y.png](http://i.imgur.com/y8rno5Y.png)

Proper update would be nice.
